page.title: 17THE PEOPLE OF PETT LEVEL IV
page.content: 4. To sum up:-a{young man's}view. The clarity of the horizon, the movements of sun,moon and clouds reflected in serpentine channels.The geometry of the ancient stranded coastline echoed in animal tracks, wind-sculpted vegetation.The emblematic character of the ditch plants:phragmites,rushes,yellow flag, flowering rush,burr-reed,water violet, arrowhead,water plantain.The changing perfumes of the sea.Shingle plants: sea kale,sea pea,yellow horned poppy. The zones of the beach:shingle,mud, elder,hawthorn, cattle's breath.Sounds of lambs,sea, curlews,lapwings, oystercatchers, wind,marsh frogs.The conspicuous cycle of bird movements throuch days, tides and seasons.Relics of human vigilance against invasions unmaterialised.Ingenuous,human,idiosyn cratic architecture.
